mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (name,username, email, password, address, sex, role) VALUES (#{name}, #{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{address}, #{sex}, #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER ORDER BY id desc
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM MEMBER WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET email = #{email}, name= #{name} WHERE id = #{id}
